title: Ticket #3620: LOCK directory in /tmp shouldn't include HOSTNAME
description: When condor_install is used to configure HTCondor, the default behavior is to put the LOCK directory under /tmp with a name that includes $(HOSTNAME). We have observed situations where HOSTNAME changes, which can lead to problems like #3618. If the LOCK directory is in /tmp, then including HOSTNAME buys no protection from multiple HTCondor installations colliding. We should take HOSTNAME out of the LOCK directory name.
